citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
IACUC semi annual reports to the Institutional Official that were due in November 2022 and May 2023 were not
completed. Semiannual reporting to the IO by the IACUC assures that the IO is aware of any adverse issues or
exceptions related to animal welfare in the animal care and use program. The facility must ensure that a signed report to
the Institutional Official is issued on a semiannual basis and is available for review at the time of inspection.
Correct by November 30, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
IACUC semi annual reports to the Institutional Official that were due in November 2022 and May 2023 were not 
completed. Semiannual reporting to the IO by the IACUC assures that the IO is aware of any adverse issues or 
exceptions related to animal welfare in the animal care and use program. The facility must ensure that a signed report to 
the Institutional Official is issued on a semiannual basis and is available for review at the time of inspection. 
 
Correct by November 30, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
 n
